attributes.action: Invest and check All Vehicles At Sea Ports - To Cut Illegal immigration
attributes.additional_details:
Despite tougher checks introduced at sea ports a large number of illegal immigrants are still getting through.

Its time to invest in technology and staffing so every single vehicle is checked at the ports, not just a selection as they do now.

Investment in technology and staffing will outweigh the costs of illegal immigrants in the long run
